resources.string: The history of your clipboard history is displayed by the long press of an input field.It will paste,If a clipboard history is chosen.
Tap of the right-top menu is carried out, the history of your clipboard history will be displayed.It will paste,If a clipboard history is chosen.
Tap of the paste button which is floating, the history of your clipboard history will be displayed.It will paste,If a clipboard history is chosen.
